column1:
## Business Analyst - Streamline Solutions

Streamline Solutions is seeking a detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our growing team. You will be responsible for eliciting, analyzing, and documenting business requirements for software development projects. 

Responsibilities include conducting stakeholder interviews, creating detailed user stories and use cases, process mapping, and assisting with testing. The ideal candidate possesses strong analytical and problem-solving skills, excellent communication abilities (written & verbal), and proficiency in tools like Microsoft Visio and Excel. 

Minimum 2 years of experience as a Business Analyst is required. Familiarity with Agile methodologies and SQL is a plus. You will collaborate directly with developers, project managers, and business stakeholders to deliver successful projects. A Bachelor’s degree in a related field is preferred.

## Database Administrator

We are seeking a skilled Database Administrator to ensure the performance, integrity, and security of our critical databases. You will be responsible for database design, implementation, maintenance, and troubleshooting. 

**Responsibilities:** Monitor system performance, implement security measures, develop and maintain backup/recovery procedures, and perform database tuning and optimization. You'll also collaborate with development and engineering teams to support application needs.

**Qualifications:** 3+ years of experience administering relational databases (SQL Server preferred). Strong SQL skills, including query optimization and stored procedure development. Experience with database backup and recovery strategies. Familiarity with database security principles and practices. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field. Proficiency in data modeling and database schema design required.

## Network Security Engineer

We are seeking a skilled Network Security Engineer to fortify our network infrastructure against evolving threats. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining security systems including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems, and VPNs. 

**Responsibilities:** Monitor network traffic for security breaches, investigate security incidents, and develop response strategies. Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing. Maintain and update security documentation. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure security best practices are integrated.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience in network security. Strong understanding of TCP/IP, routing protocols, and common attack vectors. Certifications such as Security+, CISSP, or equivalent preferred. Experience with security information and event management (SIEM) systems is a plus.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience with Hadoop ecosystem. Strong proficiency in Java, Python, or Scala. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus. Familiarity with data modeling & ETL processes required. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Familiarity with blockchain frameworks like Truffle and Hardhat. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

## ETL Developer

We are seeking a skilled ETL Developer to design, build, and maintain data pipelines. This role focuses on extracting, transforming, and loading data from various sources into our data warehouse. 

**Responsibilities:** Develop and maintain ETL processes using tools like SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), Azure Data Factory, or similar. Monitor data quality and troubleshoot issues. Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to understand data requirements. Design and implement data models. Contribute to data warehouse architecture improvements. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years of experience in ETL development. Strong SQL skills. Experience with data warehousing concepts (Kimball methodology preferred). Familiarity with cloud data platforms is a plus. Demonstrated ability to work independently and collaboratively.

## Electrical Engineer - Power Systems

We are seeking a motivated Electrical Engineer to join our growing team. This role focuses on the design, development, and testing of power distribution systems for industrial applications. 

**Responsibilities:** Conduct power system studies including load flow, short circuit, and protective device coordination. Develop single-line diagrams, three-line diagrams, and panel schedules. Perform calculations for conductor sizing, voltage drop, and equipment selection. Collaborate with project managers and technicians. Create and review technical documentation. Troubleshoot electrical systems and provide solutions.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering. Demonstrated knowledge of power systems analysis software (ETAP, SKM PowerTools). Familiarity with NEC and relevant industry standards. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. EIT/FE certification preferred.

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Civil Engineer to join our growing team. This role focuses on the planning, design, and oversight of infrastructure projects, including roads, drainage systems, and site development. 

**Responsibilities:** Prepare engineering drawings and specifications, perform quantity and cost estimates, conduct site inspections, analyze survey reports, and assist with project permitting. Collaboration with project managers, technicians, and clients is essential. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering. EIT certification preferred. Proficiency in AutoCAD Civil 3D and Microsoft Office Suite required. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills are vital. Experience with stormwater management and hydraulic modeling a plus. 3+ years relevant experience preferred.

## Software Test Engineer

**Responsibilities:** Perform functional, regression, and integration testing; identify, document, and track bugs; collaborate closely with developers and product managers; contribute to test automation efforts using Selenium.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 2+ years experience in software testing. Strong understanding of testing methodologies. Familiarity with bug tracking systems (Jira preferred). Experience with Selenium a plus. Excellent communication and analytical skills are essential. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

## Blockchain Developer

We're seeking a talented Blockchain Developer to join our innovative team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing blockchain solutions, focusing on smart contract development using Solidity and potentially Rust. 

**Responsibilities:** Design and build decentralized applications (dApps), conduct thorough code audits, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and stay current with the latest blockchain technologies.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. Proven experience developing on Ethereum or similar blockchain platforms. Strong understanding of cryptography, data structures, and algorithms. Proficiency in Solidity, JavaScript, and Git. Experience with testing and debugging smart contracts is essential. Familiarity with DeFi protocols a plus. 

We are an equal opportunity employer.

## Hadoop Engineer

We are seeking a skilled Hadoop Engineer to join our growing data team. This role focuses on building and maintaining our large-scale data processing infrastructure. 

**Responsibilities:** Design, develop, and deploy Hadoop-based solutions utilizing technologies like HDFS, MapReduce, Spark, Hive, and Pig. Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize for efficiency. Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to ingest, process, and analyze large datasets. Ensure data quality and security.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience with Hadoop ecosystem. Strong proficiency in Java or Python. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) a plus. Demonstrated understanding of data warehousing principles. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

## Electrical Engineer - Power Systems

We are seeking a highly motivated Electrical Engineer to join our growing team. This role focuses on the design, development, and testing of power distribution systems for industrial applications. 

Responsibilities include creating and analyzing electrical schematics, performing power system studies (load flow, short circuit, coordination), specifying electrical equipment, and ensuring compliance with relevant standards (NEC, IEEE). 

Candidates must possess a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, demonstrated proficiency with power systems analysis software (ETAP, SKM), and strong problem-solving skills. Experience with PLC programming and industrial automation is a plus. This position requires a solid understanding of electrical safety practices and the ability to work collaboratively within a team.

## ETL Developer

**Responsibilities:** Develop and maintain ETL processes using tools like Informatica PowerCenter, SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), or similar. Design and implement data models. Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline performance. Collaborate with data analysts & engineers. Ensure data quality and accuracy.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience in ETL development. Strong SQL skills & experience with relational databases. Proficiency in data warehousing concepts. Experience with scripting languages like Python a plus. Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure preferred.

Streamline Solutions is seeking a detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our growing team. You will be responsible for eliciting, analyzing, documenting, and validating business requirements for software development projects. 

**Responsibilities:** Conduct stakeholder interviews, create detailed user stories and use cases, map processes with flowcharts, and maintain requirement traceability matrices. You'll collaborate closely with developers and QA to ensure solutions meet business needs. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in a related field. 2+ years of experience as a Business Analyst. Proficiency in requirement gathering techniques, process modeling, and data analysis. Strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills. Experience with Agile methodologies preferred. Familiarity with SQL is a plus.

## Advocate - Empowering Voices

**Organization:** Compassion Forward

**About Us:** Compassion Forward champions the rights and wellbeing of individuals facing systemic barriers. We provide direct advocacy, community education, and policy change initiatives.

**Job Summary:** We seek a dedicated Advocate to provide comprehensive support to clients navigating complex systems. Responsibilities include conducting client interviews, assessing needs, developing advocacy plans, representing clients in meetings & hearings, maintaining detailed case records, and collaborating with partner organizations. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in social work, legal studies, or related field. Demonstrated experience in advocacy, case management, or client support. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills. Strong understanding of relevant laws and resources. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Spanish fluency a plus.

**Community Support Services** is seeking a dedicated Advocate to join our team. This role directly supports individuals facing challenging circumstances, providing empathetic guidance and practical assistance. 

Responsibilities include needs assessment, crisis intervention, resource connection (housing, food security, legal aid), and direct advocacy with external agencies. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, strong problem-solving abilities, and a demonstrated commitment to social justice. 

Requires a Bachelor’s degree in Social Work, Human Services, or a related field, and one year of experience working with vulnerable populations. Proficiency in maintaining confidential records and working collaboratively as part of a team is essential. Must be passionate about empowering clients to achieve self-sufficiency and navigate complex systems.

## Advocate - Empowering Voices

**The Haven Collective** is seeking a passionate and dedicated Advocate to join our team. This role directly supports individuals facing challenging circumstances, providing empathetic guidance and practical assistance navigating complex systems. 

Responsibilities include: conducting needs assessments, providing information & referrals to resources, assisting with form completion, and offering emotional support. The ideal candidate possesses excellent communication skills (written & verbal), strong problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to social justice. 

Requires a Bachelor’s degree in Social Work, Human Services, or a related field, and experience working with vulnerable populations. Must be proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and demonstrate cultural sensitivity. Ability to maintain confidentiality is crucial. This is a full-time position demanding strong advocacy skills and a compassionate heart.

## Hadoop Engineer

We are seeking a skilled Hadoop Engineer to join our dynamic data team. You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining our large-scale data processing infrastructure. 

**Responsibilities:** Installing, configuring, and maintaining Hadoop clusters. Developing and optimizing MapReduce, Spark, and Hive jobs. Monitoring system performance and troubleshooting issues. Working with data ingestion pipelines and data warehousing solutions. Ensuring data quality and security. Collaborating with data scientists and engineers to deliver impactful data solutions.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience with Hadoop ecosystem components. Proficiency in Java, Python, or Scala. Strong understanding of distributed systems principles. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) a plus. Familiarity with data modeling and ETL processes required.

## Advocate - Empowering Voices

**Organization:** Community Justice Network

**Position Summary:** We seek a passionate and dedicated Advocate to provide direct support and advocacy for individuals navigating complex social service systems. Responsibilities include assessing client needs, developing individualized advocacy plans, and connecting clients with vital resources like housing, healthcare, and legal aid. 

**Key Responsibilities:** Client interviews, case management documentation, collaboration with partner agencies, maintaining client confidentiality, attending meetings, and representing client interests. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in social work, human services, or related field. Demonstrated understanding of poverty, housing insecurity, and systemic barriers. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills. Must be a self-starter with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Experience with case management software preferred.

## Health & Fitness Coach - Empower Movement!

Are you a passionate and certified fitness professional dedicated to helping others achieve their wellness goals? Empower Movement is seeking a dynamic Health & Fitness Coach to deliver engaging and effective training programs. 

Responsibilities include conducting individual fitness assessments, designing personalized workout plans, leading group exercise classes (strength, cardio, flexibility), providing nutritional guidance, and motivating clients to maintain healthy lifestyles. 

Candidates must possess a current nationally recognized fitness certification (ACE, NASM, ACSM, etc.), CPR/AED certification, and demonstrable experience building rapport with diverse clientele. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills are essential. A strong understanding of anatomy, physiology, and exercise science is required. We prioritize proactive individuals with a genuine commitment to client success.

## Electrical Engineer - Power Systems

We are seeking a motivated Electrical Engineer to join our dynamic team. This role focuses on the design, development, and testing of power distribution systems for industrial applications. 

**Responsibilities:** Performing power system studies (load flow, short circuit, coordination), creating single-line diagrams using software like ETAP or SKM PowerTools, specifying electrical equipment (transformers, switchgear, generators), developing protection schemes, and assisting with field commissioning. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering. Demonstrated proficiency in power systems analysis. Strong understanding of the National Electrical Code (NEC). Experience with AutoCAD Electrical preferred. Excellent communication and problem-solving skills required. EIT/FE certification a plus. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively.

## PMO Manager

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive PMO Manager to establish and manage our project management office. You will be responsible for defining PMO standards, processes, and methodologies – including Agile and Waterfall – ensuring consistent project delivery. 

Key responsibilities include developing project templates, maintaining project documentation repositories, tracking project performance, providing PMO coaching, and facilitating cross-functional collaboration. ## Human Resources Generalist

We are seeking a motivated Human Resources Generalist to join our growing team. This role provides full-cycle HR support, including recruitment, onboarding, employee relations, performance management, and HRIS maintenance. 

Responsibilities include managing the full recruitment lifecycle – job posting, screening, interviewing, and offer negotiation. You will administer employee benefits programs, maintain accurate employee records within our HRIS system (Workday), and assist with policy development and implementation. This position also handles employee concerns, conducts investigations, and supports performance review processes. 

Candidates must have 3+ years of HR experience, a Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related field, and strong communication & organizational skills. SHRM-CP/SCP certification preferred. Proven ability to maintain confidentiality is essential.

## SAP Developer

**Responsibilities:** Design, develop, and test ABAP programs, function modules, BAPIs, and reports. Perform unit testing and debugging. Collaborate with functional consultants to translate business requirements into technical specifications. Contribute to system enhancements, upgrades, and data migration projects. Experience with SAP Fiori/UI5 development is a plus.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years of experience in SAP ABAP development. Solid understanding of SAP system architecture. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proven ability to work independently and as part of a team.

We are seeking a motivated Electrical Engineer to join our growing team. This role focuses on the design, development, and testing of power distribution systems for industrial applications. 

**Responsibilities:** Perform power system studies including load flow, short circuit, and protection coordination. Develop single-line diagrams and electrical schematics using AutoCAD. Collaborate with project managers and technicians throughout the project lifecycle. Troubleshoot electrical issues and develop effective solutions. Ensure designs adhere to industry standards (NEC, IEEE). 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering. Strong understanding of power system analysis. Proficiency in AutoCAD and ETAP preferred. Excellent communication and problem-solving skills. EIT or PE license a plus. Minimum 2 years relevant experience required.

## Network Security Engineer

We are seeking a skilled Network Security Engineer to fortify our digital defenses. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining robust network security infrastructure, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), and VPNs. 

**Responsibilities:** Monitor network traffic for security breaches, investigate security incidents, and develop mitigation strategies. Perform vulnerability assessments and penetration testing. Configure and maintain security tools. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure security compliance.

**Qualifications:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience in network security. Strong knowledge of TCP/IP, routing, switching, and security protocols. Experience with firewall administration (Cisco, Palo Alto preferred). Security certifications (e.g., Security+, CISSP) a plus. Familiarity with SIEM tools desired.

## DevOps Engineer

We're seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to join our growing team and champion automation & reliability. You will be responsible for building, maintaining, and improving our CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, and Terraform. 

Responsibilities include infrastructure as code, containerization with Docker & Kubernetes, monitoring with Prometheus & Grafana, and troubleshooting production issues. A strong understanding of Linux systems, scripting (Python, Bash), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is essential. 

Candidates should possess 3+ years of relevant experience and a proactive approach to problem-solving. Experience with configuration management tools (Ansible, Chef, Puppet) is a plus. This role demands collaboration & a commitment to delivering high-quality software.

## Network Security Engineer

We are seeking a skilled Network Security Engineer to fortify our network infrastructure. You will be responsible for implementing, maintaining, and monitoring security systems, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), and VPNs. 

**Responsibilities:** Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing, analyze security logs, respond to security incidents, and develop security documentation. You’ll also collaborate with IT teams to ensure secure network configurations and assist in disaster recovery planning. 

**Qualifications:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years experience in network security. Strong knowledge of TCP/IP, routing, switching, and common security protocols. Certifications such as CompTIA Security+, CISSP, or equivalent preferred. Experience with SIEM tools is a plus.
